name: GetMarketingEventParticipationsBreakdown
description:
Retrieve participations breakdown for a specific marketing event.

This tool fetches a detailed breakdown of participations for a specific marketing event identified by marketingEventId. It can be used to analyze participation metrics and insights for a given event.

parameters.name: marketing_event_id
parameters.description: The internal id of the marketing event in HubSpot.

value_schema.description: The internal id of the marketing event in HubSpot.

parameters.name: contact_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Contact. It can be an email or internal ID.

value_schema.description: The identifier of the Contact. It may be email or internal id.

parameters.name: participation_state
parameters.description: The participation state filter, which can be REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, or NO_SHOW.

value_schema.description: The participation state value. It may be REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW

parameters.name: response_size_limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of records to return. Default is 10, maximum is 100.

value_schema.description: The limit for response size. The default value is 10, the max number is 100

parameters.name: last_retrieved_position_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item for pagination.

value_schema.description: The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item.
